History: Present history: Patient met with an accident a few months back when she was driving. She often experiences shortness of breath and a pounding heart. She usually has a low mood and has been sleeping less; Substance use history: She doesn't consume any psychoactive substance.
Current Mental Status Examination: Behavior: Patient was cooperative and rapport could be established; Mood: Dysphoric; Affect: Restricted; Thought: Content: Reflected guilt; Insight: Grade 4.
